name: Memory Shards (itch)
description:
Who you are? Who you were?

You must trip inside your mind to seek for answers,

collecting pieces of a broken mind.

Game for the "Weekly Game Jam 276"

Keybinds:

  • Mouse - Look around
  • WASD - Move around
  • Space - Jump
  • Esc - Pause
  • 1 - Select melee weapon
  • 2 - Select pistol
  • Mouse1 - Punch / Shoot
  • R - Reload pistol
